title: Estée Lauder Bronze Goddess 2017

organizations.name: estée lauder bronze goddess 2017 estée lauder bronze goddess
estée lauder bronze goddess eau de parfum
estée lauder bronze goddess eau fraiche skinscent

text:
Estée Lauder Bronze Goddess 2017 02/17/17 06:11:55 by: Sanja Pekic The iconic summer scent of sun-kissed skin is launched yearly by Estée Lauder as Bronze Goddess , a limited edition. In 2017, in addition to the standard Eau Fraiche Skinscent concentration, Bronze Goddess Eau de Parfum is also presented. Announced as a sensual and sunny fragrance, Bronze Goddess EDP blends citrusy aromas of bergamot with milky white flowers, vanilla and warm amber. The top notes are bergamot, ginger and mandarin. Indian sambac jasmine, creamy coconut and frangipani form the heart of perfume, based on vanilla, cashmere wood, musk and amber. 
Top notes: mandarin, ginger, bergamot Heart: jasmine, coconut, frangipani Estée Lauder Bronze Goddess Eau de Parfum is available in 50 and 100 ml. Estée Lauder Bronze Goddess Eau Fraiche Skinscent 2017 contains the signature composition of the line. Its top notes represent warm sand with mandarin, bergamot, lemon and orange. The heart symbolizes bronze skin with notes of tiare flower, jasmine, magnolia, orange blossom bud and lavender. The base is trying to depict the heat of the sun with accords of amber, coconut, sandalwood, vanilla, vetiver and myrrh. Top notes: mandarin, bergamot, lemon, orange Heart: tiare, jasmine, magnolia, orange blossom, lavender Base: amber, coconut, sandalwood, vanilla, vetiver, myrrh Estée Lauder Bronze Goddess Eau Fraiche Skinscent is available in bottles of 50 ml. 
Sanja Pekić 
Sanja joined the Fragrantica team in 2009 and writes and designs articles about perfume news.
